name: OR_LOG_ANES_TYPES
description: This table contains the Anesthesia Types information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOG_ANESTH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia types category number for the log.
